testimonials.name: Oslin Johnson
testimonials.title: Lecturer
testimonials.content: Nuraan Samodien is a diligent, creative person with the ability to overcome adversity. She is a great person with the perseverance to achieve what she sets out for. Her character is one of great potential as she is not afraid to fail but rather get back on the horse and try again. Her attention to detail is remarkable as well with the keen sense to time mangement.

testimonials.name: Joel Mukanya
testimonials.title: Lecturer
testimonials.content: Nuraan is very creative, well-behaved, and dedicated. She enjoys working with her peers and works well on her project. She learned HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Javascript and Vue.

testimonials.name: Taflynne Peterson
testimonials.title: Classmate
testimonials.content: Nuraan Samodien is a very smart student and excelent coder. She understands the concepts well that she is able to explain to the next person in a very simple way. Nuraan goes the extra mile to help her peers. She works very well in a group and communicates cleary.

testimonials.name: Siyamanga Zweni
testimonials.title: Classmate
testimonials.content: Nuraan Samodien is a highly thought intellectual, who enjoys helping others. She is always positive with great enthusiasm. She is always excited to take on new challenges. She is trustworthy and with no doubt she can ensure that your company goals are being achieved.

testimonials.name: Eighton-Lee Paulse
testimonials.title: Classmate
testimonials.content: Nuraan is a very helpful person. She's always looking to help others when they are struggling and is very passionate about what she does. Her motivation is endless and she is hardworking. I would 100% recommend her.

testimonials.name: Thotyelwa Mpongwana
testimonials.title: Classmate
testimonials.content: Nuraan is a hard working individual, who always finds ways to improve her craft. Having a positive mindset always helps her to tackle her hardships. A truly exceptional woman.

testimonials.name: Abdul-Azeez Kemp
testimonials.title: Assistant Lecturer
testimonials.content: Nuraan is a wonderful, focused, and creative person, she is a great person to work with. She has the characteristics of a great team player and could be a great team leader when she puts her mind to the position.

hobbies.title: Reading
hobbies.description: I thoroughly enjoy reading as it has so many benefits such as improving my memory, increased focus and concetration, and better cognitive function by honing critical thinking skills. It also expands my knowledge and undertsanding of the world and alllows me to ecape, relax and recharge.

hobbies.title: Painting
hobbies.description: I also enjoy painting as it has several benefits. Painting really healps me improve my concentration and develop my critical thinking skills. It also stimulates and boosts my creative growth and gets really messy sometimes!

hobbies.title: Coding
hobbies.description: Of course! Coding is simply a great skill to have and is currently one of the most in-demand skills across the world. Although it gets really heated at times, the end result is always rewarding and satisfying to see how it looks and runs.

hobbies.title: Surfing
hobbies.description: Surfing is my favourite sport and hobby as it not only helps keep me fit, but also allows me to relieve any stress or worries. It is truly such a calming, unique and fun experience for me.

hobbies.title: Hiking
hobbies.description: I enjoy going for hikes as it has so many health benefits. Spending quality time in the great outdoors reduces stress and calms anxiety. I really enjoy being out in nature and having a fun time with family.

hobbies.title: Sewing
hobbies.description: In my free time I enjoy sewing. This skill helps me develop better self-discipline and problem solving. It is also a wonderful feeling wearing a piece of clothing I cut and sew with my very own hands and it also helps reduce the environmental impact.
